Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @hyperDEX assuming that people are making risk free 5% and this becomes known to others and it isnt so hard to get setup, then it does seem a very likely scenario. the problem is that each 5% mm is incentivized to keep it secret so he can make his 5% as long as possible and so the process isnt directly self-perpetuating. However, if the takers are understanding that the makers on the other side are making a "free" 5%, then maybe some of them will want the 4% for themselves

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and similar to mining as you say, an equilibrium will be reached

Author: mobipoi#5774
Content: In addition to that the taker must want to use dex in the first place and pay a premium

Author: mobipoi#5774
Content: As opposed to using CEX so maybe binance removing 40% of the users base and placing them in a restricted market helps, there are also small caps coins that with passionate community looking for alternatives

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there are also the direct makers that have inventory not on CEX, so there is price competition with that also, but initially the higher volumes will be via CEX indirectly

Author: mobipoi#5774
Content: Oh yeah that's true

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if just one whale in a coin community sets up atomicDEX marketmaking, that allows everyone to be able to trade into and out of that coin

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that increases the value of that coin

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so it is in the interests of the whales in each coin community to create this liquidity to enhance their coin value

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: LTC proves that liquidity in a coin has a lot of value, as that is really LTC only value

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and once a whales starts marketmaking, then they will realize the power of the liquidity multiplier. 1 BTC worth acts as 10BTC, or 20BTC or more, depending on how many orders are made. so even with just 100 BTC worth of total liquidity, we would get overall liquidity equivalent to thousands of BTC

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but all this will take time, as it is new territory and people wont instantly go from not using atomicDEX to providing 10 BTC across 20 order pairs

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: by "BTC" i mean the equivalent of one BTC worth of coins
